I developed a tool for the recycler to put into the middle slot.
It consists of cameras and a laser which precisely cuts a suitable unit. This process is very versatile, but it quadruples the energy requirements.

This tool features many recipes, for example: 
 -All products of the Assembly Table 
 -Horse Armor 
 -Products of the "Decorations"-tab (uncolored, if possible) 
 -Iron Bars, Minecarts, Buckets 
 -More
